title: General Dentistry
desc: Tooth whitening can be a very effective way of lightening the natural colour of your teeth wtihout removing any of the tooth surface. it cannot make a complete colour change.

title: Cosmetic Destistry
desc: Your dentist will need to access your teeth to make sure that you are suitable for the treatment.Once it has been agreed this procedure uselly takes about one hour.

title: Dental Impplants
desc: In Europe and in some other countries whitening can only legally be carried out by  dentist. So tooth whitening by beauticians.

title: Orthodontics
desc: Some people may find that their teeth become sensitve to cold during or after the treatment.others may have discomfort in the gums, a sore throat or white patches on the gum line.

title: Teeth Whitening
desc: The total treatment can usually be done within three or there visits to the dentist. Your dental team will or three visits to the dentist.

title: Teath Cleaning
desc: There are several whitening toothpastes on the market. Although they do not affect the natural colour of your teeth,they sure effective at removing staining.
